data.title: India approves AstraZeneca and local COVID vaccines, rollout soon
data.description: NEW DELHI — India’s drugs regulator on Sunday gave final approval for the emergency-use of two coronavirus vaccines, one developed by AstraZeneca and Oxford University and the other by local company Bharat Biotech and a state-run institute.
